[% END %]

[% END %]

[% FOREACH service IN zone.services %]
[% END %]
[% FOREACH port IN zone.ports %]
[% END %]

[% END %]

[% END %]

[% END %]
[% FOREACH forward_port IN zone.forward_ports %]
[% END %]
[% FOREACH source_port IN zone.source_ports %]

[% IF rule.source.name == "address" %]
